ciscoVqeSMIB.name: ciscoVqeSMIB
ciscoVqeSMIB.contactinfo: Cisco Systems Customer Service Postal: 170 W Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETS E-mail: bxb-iptv-team@cisco.com
ciscoVqeSMIB.description: This MIB module defines a set of objects for monitoring the Visual Quality Experience Server (VQE-S) operational status. VQE-S receives the channel lineups from the VQE Channel Provisioning Tool. Each channel is uniquely identified with a Service Delivery Protocol (SDP) description, including: - IP multicast address - Real-Time Protocol (RTP) port number - Real-Time Control Protocol (RTCP) port number - Unicast feedback target address - RTP and RTCP port numbers VQE-S supports Error Repair (ER) and Rapid Channel Change (RCC) technologies to improve the delivery of IPTV video services. When a VQE client (VQE-C) notices a missing packet or a group of missing packets, it sends an RTCP Feedback Generic NACK to the VQE-S. The VQE-S looks into its cache, and if it has any of the requested packets, it sends them immediately to the VQE-C as RTP retransmission repair packets. When the VQE-C detects a channel change, it immediately sends an RTCP Picture Loss Indication (PLI) NACK to the VQE-S to request the information for the VQE-C to recover its picture. Both ER and RCC are unicast retransmissions.

cvqsNotificationsEnable.name: cvqsNotificationsEnable
cvqsNotificationsEnable.description: This object specifies whether cvqsChannelUp and cvqsChannelDown notifications will be generated or not. A false value will prevent these notifications from being generated.

cvqsNumberofChannels.name: cvqsNumberofChannels
cvqsNumberofChannels.description: This object indicates total number of channels in the channel lineup configuration.

cvqsActiveChannels.name: cvqsActiveChannels
cvqsActiveChannels.description: This object indicates total number of channels successfully parsed from the channel lineup.

cvqsLastUpdatedTime.name: cvqsLastUpdatedTime
cvqsLastUpdatedTime.description: This object indicates the time when the channel lineup was last updated.

cvqsChannelTable.name: cvqsChannelTable
cvqsChannelTable.description: This table contains the list of channels (i.e., the channel lineup) this VQE-S is servicing.

cvqsChannelTableEntry.name: cvqsChannelTableEntry
cvqsChannelTableEntry.description: This entry contains information about one channel seviced by the VQE-S system. The entry is created and removed via the Net-SNMP cache helper.

cvqsChannelIndex.name: cvqsChannelIndex
cvqsChannelIndex.description: An arbitrary integer-value that uniquely identifies this channel.

cvqsChannelMulticastIPType.name: cvqsChannelMulticastIPType
cvqsChannelMulticastIPType.description: This object indicates the address type of channel multicast IP address.

cvqsChannelMulticastIPAddr.name: cvqsChannelMulticastIPAddr
cvqsChannelMulticastIPAddr.description: This object indicates the channel's multicast IP address.

cvqsChannelMulticastPort.name: cvqsChannelMulticastPort
cvqsChannelMulticastPort.description: This object indicates the channel's multicast port number.

cvqsChannelStatus.name: cvqsChannelStatus
cvqsChannelStatus.description: This object indicates the current status of this channel.

cvqsChannelMemberPopulation.name: cvqsChannelMemberPopulation
cvqsChannelMemberPopulation.description: This object indicates the number of VQE clients listening to this channel.

cvqsTotalReceivedERMsgs.name: cvqsTotalReceivedERMsgs
cvqsTotalReceivedERMsgs.description: This object indicates the total number of requests for ER (Generic NACK RTCP) messages received.

cvqsTotalReceivedInvalidERMsgs.name: cvqsTotalReceivedInvalidERMsgs
cvqsTotalReceivedInvalidERMsgs.description: This object indicates the number of requests for ER (Generic NACK RTCP messages) received that were invalid.

cvqsTotalReceivedERPkts.name: cvqsTotalReceivedERPkts
cvqsTotalReceivedERPkts.description: This object indicates the total number of RTP packets requested for retransmission.

cvqsTotalSentERPkts.name: cvqsTotalSentERPkts
cvqsTotalSentERPkts.description: This object indicates the total number of retransmitted RTP packets.

cvqsTotalReceivedRCCs.name: cvqsTotalReceivedRCCs
cvqsTotalReceivedRCCs.description: This object indicates the total number of RCC requests received by the VQE-S.

cvqsTotalAcceptedRCCs.name: cvqsTotalAcceptedRCCs
cvqsTotalAcceptedRCCs.description: This object indicates the total number of RCC requests accepted by the VQE-S.

cvqsTotalRefusedRCCs.name: cvqsTotalRefusedRCCs
cvqsTotalRefusedRCCs.description: This object indicates the total number of RCC requests not accepted by the VQE-S.

cvqsTotalRTCPReceivers.name: cvqsTotalRTCPReceivers
cvqsTotalRTCPReceivers.description: This object indicates the number of currently active RTCP receivers.

cvqsRejectedRTCPs.name: cvqsRejectedRTCPs
cvqsRejectedRTCPs.description: This object indicates the number of received RTCP packets (ER requests, RCC requests or Receiver Reports) rejected by the VQE-S due to active RTCP receivers in VQE-S reaching their limit of accepting RTCP requests.

cvqsRejectedERs.name: cvqsRejectedERs
cvqsRejectedERs.description: This object indicates the number of received ER requests rejected by the VQE-S due to VQE-S reaching its limit of accepting ER requests.

cvqsRejectedRCCs.name: cvqsRejectedRCCs
cvqsRejectedRCCs.description: This object indicates the number of received RCC requests rejected by the VQE-S due to VQE-S reaching its limit of accepting RCC requests.

cvqsChannelUp.name: cvqsChannelUp
cvqsChannelUp.description: This notification indicates that a VQE-S channel status is changed to ACTIVE.

cvqsChannelDown.name: cvqsChannelDown
cvqsChannelDown.description: This notification indicates that a VQE-S channel status is changed to INACTIVE or INOPERATIVE.

cvqsMIBCompliance.name: cvqsMIBCompliance
cvqsMIBCompliance.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement this MIB.

ciscoVqeSControlGroup.name: ciscoVqeSControlGroup
ciscoVqeSControlGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the VQE-S control information.

ciscoVqeSChannelGroup.name: ciscoVqeSChannelGroup
ciscoVqeSChannelGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the VQE-S channel information.

ciscoVqeSERGroup.name: ciscoVqeSERGroup
ciscoVqeSERGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the VQE-S Error Repair information.

ciscoVqeSRCCGroup.name: ciscoVqeSRCCGroup
ciscoVqeSRCCGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the VQE-S Rapid Channel Change information.

ciscoVqeSCapacityGroup.name: ciscoVqeSCapacityGroup
ciscoVqeSCapacityGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the VQE-S Capacity information.

ciscoVqeSNotifGroup.name: ciscoVqeSNotifGroup
ciscoVqeSNotifGroup.description: This group contains the collection of all the notifications for a Cisco VQE-S Entity.
